'''''Mythlore'' 66''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol17/iss4/ Volume 17, Issue 4]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

====Articles====

* Potts, Stephen. “The Many Faces of the Hero in ''The Lord of the Rings''.”
* Simmons, Courtney Lynn, and Joe Simmons. “''The Silver Chair'' and Plato's Allegory of the Cave: Archetypes of Spiritual Liberation.”
* Roche, Norma. “Sailing West: Tolkien, the Saint Brendan Story, and the Idea of Paradise in the West.”
* Byfield, Bruce. “‘Sister Picture of Dorian Grey’: The Image of the Female in Fritz Leiber's ''Conjure Wife''.”
* Callahan, Tim. “Devil, Trickster and Fool.”
* Thorpe, Dwayne. “Fantasy Characterization: The Example of Tolkien.”
* Kenny, Stuart. “The Now of Salvation: Thoughts on Charles Williams' ‘''Et In Sempiternum Pereant''’.”
* Ryan, J. S. “By ‘Significant’ Compounding ‘We Pass Insensibly in the World of Epic’.”

====Features====

* GoodKnight, Glen H. Editorial Introduction: Chronological Snobbery.
* Christopher, Joe R., and Wayne G. Hammond. An Inklings Bibliography (43).
* Letters.

====Reviews====

* ''The 1992 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''. Illus. by Ted Nasmith. Reviewed by Paula DiSante.
* ''Word and Story in C.S. Lewis''. Ed. Peter J. Schakel and Charles A. Huttar. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''Dorothy L. Sayers, Solving the Mystery of Wickedness.'' Mitzi Brunsdale. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''The Lord of the Rings (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)''. Leonard Rosenman. Reviewed by Chris Seeman.
